```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("broom")
library("cowplot")
library("ggplot2")
```

```{r}
read_tsv("./../data/04_aug_clean.tsv") |>
  mutate(across(everything(), ~replace_na(., 0))) |>
  select(GAD65,IA_2,IAA,ZnT8) |>
  prcomp() |>
  ggplot(aes(GAD65, IA_2, color = outcome)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1.5) +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c(something = "#D55E00", something_else = "#0072B2")
  ) +
  theme_half_open(12) + background_grid()
## does it make sense to concatenate case_control and id?
```
